attributes.action: DO NOT let refugees in to UK! Stop illegal migration! Save our homeland!
attributes.additional_details: Europe is suffering from refugees! david Cameron promised us to protect uk from additional migrants! Those people are not assylum seekers! They do not wish to stay as a refugees in poor economic countries! They will steel from our pockets and our social care! We have our own people to help to! Our public sector is week! Stop this illegal migration!
attributes.background: We must stop refugees coming in to UK! They are not refugees they are illegal immigrants who want to damage our voice of freedom, our religion and our lifestyle! They have a different culture and background! They must fight for they own homeland! protect uk boarders! Use our army if needed!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142
